Anger Management

 

    

Tweet

Rated
PG-13

Director
Peter Segal

Writer
David Dorfman

Starring
Jack Nicholson
Adam Sandler
Marisa Tomei
Allen Covert

Summary
A businessman is sentenced to an anger-management program, where he is forced to live with a very aggressive and angry therapist for treatment.
